text: 8|60|avare nēriṭān vēṇṭi niṅṅaḷuṭe kaḻivil peṭṭa ellā śaktiyuṁ, keṭṭinirttiya kutirakaḷeyuṁ niṅṅaḷ orukkuka. atumukhēna allāhuvinṟeyuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭeyuṁ śatruveyuṁ, avarkk puṟame niṅṅaḷ aṟiyāttavaruṁ allāhu aṟiyunnavarumāya maṟṟucilareyuṁ niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭuttuvān vēṇṭi. niṅṅaḷ allāhuvinṟe mārgattil ēteāru vastu celavaḻiccāluṁ niṅṅaḷkkatinṟe pūrṇṇamāya pratiphalaṁ nalkappeṭuṁ. niṅṅaḷēāṭ anīti kāṇikkappeṭunnatalla
